name_setting.banner: Aye, I don't be knowin' ye, landlubber... Who be ye?

qr_camera.scan_code:
Avast! {{username}}, scan th'
QR code to embark on yer next adventure!
qr_camera.invalid_code: Yer QR code not workin', landlubber!
qr_camera.permission_denied: We be needin' access th' camera, bud.
qr_camera.quest_not_reached: Ye haven't sailed to the quest yet, matey

quest_1.introduction:
“{{username}}!!
I be needin' ye! Lighten yer path ‘n come topside!”

quest_2.introduction: Outside, you see Buzzard, Captain of The Victorious. Looking at you, he says...
quest_2.buzzard_screen_1: ”Arr, ye've come quick, matey! Help attack th’ Nossa Senhora do Cabo!”
quest_2.buzzard_screen_2:
“Lend a hand 'n load th’ pistols, {{username}}.
Give 'em a good shake!”

quest_3.introduction: While boarding, the crew quickly responded. Whilst fighting, Buzzard says...
quest_3.buzzard_screen_1: “Aye {{username}}! Invoke {{blackbeard}} to aid us settlin’ this fight!”
quest_3.buzzard_screen_2: “Many thanks fer all. Join me in me quarters once our work be done.”

end_of_story: “I be in yer debt, matey. Take this gold as a token o' me thanks.”
